service_description.short_description: AI-powered clinical trial matching using hybrid neuro-symbolic reasoning
service_description.description:
MediChain provides intelligent clinical trial matching for patients using a hybrid AI approach combining Google Gemini's NLP capabilities with MeTTa-style symbolic reasoning. The service analyzes patient profiles against trial eligibility criteria to find optimal matches with explainable reasoning.

Features:
- Semantic matching of conditions, biomarkers, and demographics
- MeTTa-style symbolic reasoning for eligibility determination
- FHIR-compatible patient data input
- Explainable AI with detailed reasoning traces
- Privacy-preserving with on-chain consent management

Use Cases:
- Patient self-matching to clinical trials
- Healthcare provider trial recommendations
- Pharmaceutical company patient recruitment
- Research institutions seeking eligible participants
